title: When I make calls and change to hands free mold, it become black screen.
content:
from Last week no update my some start to have black screen issue when I change from normal calling mode to handsfree mold. the phone still working but just the screen is not showing. until 2-3 mins when the calling is end by receiver or its self. I can not even end the calls. 

it works normal again when i restart the phone. and it will have again later.
